metadata.dc:title: First report of Montagnea arenaria (D. C.) Zeller (Agaricales) in Chile
metadata.dc:creator: Mu√±oz, M
Madrid Lorca, H
metadata.dc:description: Montagnea arenaria (D.C.) Zeller (Agaricales), an interesting basidiomycete adapted to arid environments is recorded for the first time from a sample collected on sandy soil in the northern zone of Chile. Its mature fruiting body is described. Taxonomic and ecological comments are also addressed(AU)
metadata.dc:title: Primer registro de Montagnea arenaria (D. C.) Zeller (Agaricales) en Chile
